sourcesContent:
<template>
  <gucp-dialog ref="platformDialog" :title="dialog.title" :confirm-label="dialog.labelName"
    @confirm="onConfirmCreateType('createForm')">
    <el-form ref="createForm" :model="createForm" label-width="120px" label-suffix=":">
      <el-form-item :label="$t('sourceName')" prop="platformName">
        <el-input v-model="createForm.platformName" :placeholder="$t('sourceName')" />
      </el-form-item>
      <el-form-item :label="$t('sourceType')" prop="platformType">
        <el-input v-model="createForm.platformType" :placeholder="$t('sourceType')" />
      </el-form-item>
      <el-form-item :label="$t('sourceDes')" prop="platformDesc">
        <el-input v-model="createForm.platformDesc" :placeholder="$t('sourceDes')" />
      </el-form-item>
    </el-form>
  </gucp-dialog>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  data () {
    return {
      createForm: {
        name: '',
        id: ''
      },
      dialog: {
        title: this.$t('create'),
        labelName: this.$t('create')
      }
    }
  },
  methods: {
    open (item) {
      if (item) {
        this.createForm = {
          id: item.id,
          platformDesc: item.platformDesc,
          platformName: item.platformName,
          platformType: item.platformType
        }
        this.dialog = {
          title: this.$t('editSource'),
          labelName: this.$t('save'),
          buttonType: 'UPDATE'
        }
      } else {
        this.createForm = {
          platformDesc: '',
          platformName: '',
          platformType: ''
        }
        this.dialog = {
          title: this.$t('createSource'),
          labelName: this.$t('create'),
          buttonType: 'CREATE'
        }
      }
      this.$refs.platformDialog.open()
    },
    onConfirmCreateType (formName) {
      this.$refs[formName].validate(valid => {
        if (valid) {
          if (!this.createForm.platformDesc) {
            this.$message.error(this.$t('sourxceDesNoempty'))
            return
          } else if (!this.createForm.platformName) {
            this.$message.error(this.$t('sourceNameNoempty'))
            return
          } else if (!this.createForm.platformType) {
            this.$message.error(this.$t('sourceTypeNoempty'))
            return
          }
          this.$refs.platformDialog.close()
          if (this.dialog.buttonType === 'CREATE') {
            this.$emit('success', { data: this.createForm, code: 0 })
          } else {
            this.$emit('success', { data: this.createForm, code: 1 })
          }
        }
      })
    }
  }
}
</script>
